otherNames: Eternal God Emperor, 800年越しの復讐, 8백년 전으로 회귀, Eternal Emperor (Flying Fish), God Emperor (Flying Fish), God Emperor of Eternity, The Ancient Gods, Vạn Cổ Thần Đế, Wan Gu Shen Di, Wàn Gǔ Shén Dì, 万古神帝, 尘帝归来, 萬古神帝
synopsis: A supreme martial artist is killed by his beloved and is reincarnated 800 years into the future. He’s reborn as Ruochen Zhang, the sickly and lowly ninth son and prince. His doting mother is the exception to a family of treacherous schemers who jockey for power and status, so it surprises everyone when Ruochen emerges as a martial arts prodigy! Determined to protect his mother and avenge her suffering, nothing will stop Ruochen from becoming the greatest martial artist in this world too!
